snippet.title: DROVA Forsaken Kin - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Drova is an Action-RPG that marries the dark grim tones of its genre with the mysticism of Celtic mythology. Encounter a society where ancient restless spirits and divided factions battle for dominance. Uncover forgotten abilities and unravel the secrets of a past shrouded in mystery. And prepare to be beaten up. Quite often. But don't worry. You'll become stronger. And time for payback will come.

Coming to PC, Xbox, PlayStation and Nintendo Switch October 15th

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1585180/Drova__Forsaken_Kin/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/J2D_Interactive
